divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife and i were enjoying the evening sky. from the north travelling in an easterly direction came a star like object, no sound, no flashing lights. we had enough time to go in and get our kids to see it. the moment my oldest, who's battling luekemia, stepped out onto the porch, this light, which was already brighter that the light of jupiter, flared brighter, and continued its course til we lost visual sight under the horizon trees. my wife, whose vision seems to be better than mine, thought she could make out a triangular shape. ****we saw the same light, coming from the same direction oct. 7th, at approximatley 645 pm. very strange.
